org.jcatapult.deployer
Class BaseDeployer

java.lang.Object
  org.jcatapult.deployer.BaseDeployer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Deployer
public abstract class BaseDeployer
extends Object
implements Deployer

Base class for groovy deployers. It is not necessary to extend this class but it does provide convenience methods for inheriting secure copies and SSH exec capability

Method Detail

scp

public void scp(String host,
                String username,
                String password,
                File file,
                String to)

Perfrms a secure copy

Parameters:
host - the host to scp to
username - the username of the host account
password - the password associated to the host account
file - the file to scp
to - the directory to scp to

sshExec

public String sshExec(String host,
                      String username,
                      String password,
                      String command)

Executes a command via SSH

Parameters:
host - the host
username - the host username
password - the username password
command - the command to execute
Returns:
the result of the executed command
